forms.FormApp.name: FormApp
forms.FormApp.doc: Allows a script to open an existing Form or create a new one.

property.name: Alignment
property.doc: An enumeration of types of image alignment.

property.name: DestinationType
property.doc: An enumeration of types of destinations that can store form responses.

property.name: FeedbackType
property.doc: An enumeration of types of form Feedbacks.

property.name: ItemType
property.doc: An enumeration of types of form Items.

property.name: PageNavigationType
property.doc: An enumeration of possible behaviors for navigating pages.

method.name: create
method.doc: Creates and returns a new Form.

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the name of the new form

method.name: createCheckboxGridValidation
method.doc: Returns an instance of a CheckboxGridValidationBuilder which can be used to set validation on a CheckboxGridItem.

method.name: createCheckboxValidation
method.doc: Returns an instance of a CheckboxValidationBuilder which can be used to set validation on a CheckboxItem.

method.name: createFeedback
method.doc: Returns an instance of a QuizFeedbackBuilder which can be used to set feedback on a gradeable Item.

method.name: createGridValidation
method.doc: Returns an instance of a GridValidationBuilder which can be used to set validation on a GridItem.

method.name: createParagraphTextValidation
method.doc: Returns an instance of a ParagraphTextValidationBuilder which can be used to set validation on a ParagraphTextItem.

method.name: createTextValidation
method.doc: Returns an instance of a TextValidationBuilder which can be used to set validation on a TextItem.

method.name: getActiveForm
method.doc: Returns the form to which the script is container-bound.

method.name: getUi
method.doc: Returns an instance of the form editor's user-interface environment that allows the script to add features like menus, dialogs, and sidebars.

method.name: openById
method.doc: Returns the Form with the specified ID.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the ID of the form to open

method.name: openByUrl
method.doc: Returns the Form with the specified URL.

argument.name: url
argument.doc: the URL of the form to open

forms.CheckboxGridItem.name: CheckboxGridItem
forms.CheckboxGridItem.doc: A question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select multiple choices per row from a sequence of checkboxes. Items can be accessed or created from a Form.

method.name: clearValidation
method.doc: Removes any data validation for this grid item.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this checkbox grid item.

argument.name: responses
argument.doc: an array of arrays of valid answers for this checkbox grid item

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getColumns
method.doc: Gets the values for every column in the grid.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getRows
method.doc: Gets the values for every row in the grid.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setColumns
method.doc: Sets the columns of the grid based on an array of values.

argument.name: columns
argument.doc: an array of column values, which respondents see as labels when viewing the form

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setRows
method.doc: Sets the rows of the grid based on an array of values.

argument.name: rows
argument.doc: an array of row values, which respondents see as labels when viewing the form

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

method.name: setValidation
method.doc: Sets the data validation for this checkbox grid item.

argument.name: validation
argument.doc: a CheckboxGridValidation to apply to this item.

method.name: requireLimitOneResponsePerColumn
method.doc: Requires limit of one response per column for a grid item.

forms.CheckboxItem.name: CheckboxItem
forms.CheckboxItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to select one or more checkboxes, as well as an optional "other" field. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are autograded.

method.name: clearValidation
method.doc: Removes any data validation for this checkbox item.

method.name: createChoice
method.doc: Creates a new choice.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the choice's value, which respondents see as a label when viewing the form

method.name: createChoice
method.doc: Creates a new choice.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the choice's value, which respondents see as a label when viewing the form

argument.name: isCorrect
argument.doc: whether the choice is a correct answer

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this checkbox item.

argument.name: responses
argument.doc: an array of valid answers for this multiple-choice item

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getChoices
method.doc: Gets all choices for an item.

method.name: getFeedbackForCorrect
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond correctly to a question.

method.name: getFeedbackForIncorrect
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond incorrectly to a question.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPoints
method.doc: Returns the point value of a gradeable item.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: hasOtherOption
method.doc: Determines whether the item has an "other" option.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setChoiceValues
method.doc: Sets the choices for an item from an array of strings.

argument.name: values
argument.doc: the array of choice values, which respondents see as labels when viewing the form

method.name: setChoices
method.doc: Sets an array of choices for an item.

argument.name: choices
argument.doc: an array of choices

method.name: setFeedbackForCorrect
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond correctly to a question.

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback. A null value will clear the feedback.

method.name: setFeedbackForIncorrect
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond incorrectly to a question.

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setPoints
method.doc: Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.

argument.name: points
argument.doc: the number of a points a question item is worth

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

method.name: setValidation
method.doc: Sets the data validation for this checkbox item.

argument.name: validation
argument.doc: a CheckboxValidation to apply to this item.

method.name: showOtherOption
method.doc: Sets whether the item has an "other" option.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if the item has an "other" option; false if not

method.name: requireSelectAtLeast
method.doc: Require at least this many choices to be selected.

method.name: requireSelectAtMost
method.doc: Require at most this many choices to be selected.

method.name: requireSelectExactly
method.doc: Require exactly this many choices to be selected.

forms.Choice.name: Choice
forms.Choice.doc: A single choice associated with a type of Item that supports choices, like CheckboxItem, ListItem, or MultipleChoiceItem.

method.name: getGotoPage
method.doc: Gets the PageBreakItem set as a GO_TO_PAGE destination if the responder selects this choice and completes the current page.

method.name: getPageNavigationType
method.doc: Gets the PageNavigationType that occurs if the responder selects this choice and completes the current page.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the choice's value, which respondents see as a label when viewing the form.

method.name: isCorrectAnswer
method.doc: Gets whether the choice is a correct answer for the question.

forms.DateItem.name: DateItem
forms.DateItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are graded.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this date item.

argument.name: response
argument.doc: a Date object that represents a month, day, and possibly year

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPoints
method.doc: Returns the point value of a gradeable item.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: includesYear
method.doc: Determines whether the date item includes a year option.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question that doesn't have a correct or incorrect answer (ie questions that require manual grading).

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setIncludesYear
method.doc: Sets whether the date item includes a year setting.

argument.name: enableYear
argument.doc: true if the date includes a year setting; false if not

method.name: setPoints
method.doc: Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.

argument.name: points
argument.doc: the number of a points a question item is worth

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

forms.DateTimeItem.name: DateTimeItem
forms.DateTimeItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date and time. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are graded.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this date-time item.

argument.name: response
argument.doc: a Date object that represents a month, day, hour, minute, and possibly year

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPoints
method.doc: Returns the point value of a gradeable item.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: includesYear
method.doc: Determines whether the date item includes a year option.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question that doesn't have a correct or incorrect answer (ie questions that require manual grading).

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setIncludesYear
method.doc: Sets whether the date item includes a year setting.

argument.name: enableYear
argument.doc: true if the date includes a year setting; false if not

method.name: setPoints
method.doc: Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.

argument.name: points
argument.doc: the number of a points a question item is worth

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

forms.DurationItem.name: DurationItem
forms.DurationItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a length of time. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are graded.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this date item.

argument.name: hours
argument.doc: the hours, represented as an integer from 0 to 72

argument.name: minutes
argument.doc: the minutes, represented as an integer from 0 to 59

argument.name: seconds
argument.doc: the seconds, represented as an integer from 0 to 59

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPoints
method.doc: Returns the point value of a gradeable item.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question that doesn't have a correct or incorrect answer (ie questions that require manual grading).

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setPoints
method.doc: Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.

argument.name: points
argument.doc: the number of a points a question item is worth

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

forms.Form.name: Form
forms.Form.doc: A form that contains overall properties and items. Properties include title, settings, and where responses are stored. Items include question items like checkboxes or radio items, while layout items refer to things like page breaks. Forms can be accessed or created from FormApp.

method.name: addCheckboxGridItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select multiple choices per row from a sequence of checkboxes.

method.name: addCheckboxItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to select one or more checkboxes, as well as an optional "other" field.

method.name: addDateItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date.

method.name: addDateTimeItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date and time.

method.name: addDurationItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a length of time.

method.name: addEditor
method.doc: Adds the given user to the list of editors for the Form.

argument.name: emailAddress
argument.doc: the email address of the user to add

method.name: addEditor
method.doc: Adds the given user to the list of editors for the Form.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: a representation of the user to add

method.name: addEditors
method.doc: Adds the given array of users to the list of editors for the Form.

argument.name: emailAddresses
argument.doc: an array of email addresses of the users to add

method.name: addGridItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select one choice per row from a sequence of radio buttons.

method.name: addImageItem
method.doc: Appends a new layout item that displays an image.

method.name: addListItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a drop-down list.

method.name: addMultipleChoiceItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a list of radio buttons or an optional "other" field.

method.name: addPageBreakItem
method.doc: Appends a new layout item that marks the start of a page.

method.name: addParagraphTextItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to enter a block of text.

method.name: addScaleItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to choose one option from a numbered sequence of radio buttons.

method.name: addSectionHeaderItem
method.doc: Appends a new layout item that visually indicates the start of a section.

method.name: addTextItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to enter a single line of text.

method.name: addTimeItem
method.doc: Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a time of day.

method.name: addVideoItem
method.doc: Appends a new layout item that displays a video.

method.name: canEditResponse
method.doc: Determines whether the form displays a link to edit a response after submitting it.

method.name: collectsEmail
method.doc: Determines whether the form collects respondents' email addresses.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new response to the form.

method.name: deleteAllResponses
method.doc: Deletes all submitted responses from the form's response store.

method.name: deleteItem
method.doc: Deletes the item at a given index among all the items in the form.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the index of the item among all the items in the form

method.name: deleteItem
method.doc: Deletes the given item.

argument.name: item
argument.doc: the item to be deleted

method.name: deleteResponse
method.doc: Deletes a single response from the form's response store.

argument.name: responseId
argument.doc: the ID of the form response to delete

method.name: getConfirmationMessage
method.doc: Gets the form's confirmation message.

method.name: getCustomClosedFormMessage
method.doc: Gets the custom message that will be displayed if the form is not accepting responses, or an empty string if no custom message has been set.

method.name: getDescription
method.doc: Gets the form's description.

method.name: getDestinationId
method.doc: Gets the ID of the form's response destination.

method.name: getDestinationType
method.doc: Gets the type of the form's response destination.

method.name: getEditUrl
method.doc: Gets the URL that can be used to access the form's edit mode.

method.name: getEditors
method.doc: Gets the list of editors for this Form.

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the ID of the form.

method.name: getItemById
method.doc: Gets the item with a given ID.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the item's ID

method.name: getItems
method.doc: Gets an array of all items in the form.

method.name: getItems
method.doc: Gets an array of all items of a given type.

argument.name: itemType
argument.doc: the type of items to retrieve

method.name: getPublishedUrl
method.doc: Gets the URL that can be used to respond to the form.

method.name: getResponse
method.doc: Gets a single form response based on its response ID.

argument.name: responseId
argument.doc: the ID for the form response

method.name: getResponses
method.doc: Gets an array of all of the form's responses.

method.name: getResponses
method.doc: Gets an array of all of the form's responses after a given date and time.

argument.name: timestamp
argument.doc: the earliest date and time for which form responses should be returned

method.name: getShuffleQuestions
method.doc: Determines whether the order of the questions on each page of the form is randomized.

method.name: getSummaryUrl
method.doc: Gets the URL that can be used to view a summary of the form's responses.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the form's title.

method.name: hasLimitOneResponsePerUser
method.doc: Determines whether the form allows only one response per respondent.

method.name: hasProgressBar
method.doc: Determines whether the form displays a progress bar.

method.name: hasRespondAgainLink
method.doc: Determines whether the form displays a link to submit another response after a respondent completes the form.

method.name: isAcceptingResponses
method.doc: Determines whether the form is currently accepting responses.

method.name: isPublishingSummary
method.doc: Determines whether the form displays a link to view a summary of responses after a respondent completes the form.

method.name: isQuiz
method.doc: Determines whether the form is a quiz.

method.name: moveItem
method.doc: Moves an item at a given index among all the items in the form to another given index.

argument.name: from
argument.doc: the current index of the item among all the items in the form

argument.name: to
argument.doc: the new index for the item among all the items in the form

method.name: moveItem
method.doc: Moves a given item to an given index among all the items in the form.

argument.name: item
argument.doc: the item to move

argument.name: toIndex
argument.doc: the new index for the item among all the items in the form

method.name: removeDestination
method.doc: Unlinks the form from its current response destination.

method.name: removeEditor
method.doc: Removes the given user from the list of editors for the Form.

argument.name: emailAddress
argument.doc: the email address of the user to remove

method.name: removeEditor
method.doc: Removes the given user from the list of editors for the Form.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: a representation of the user to remove

method.name: requiresLogin
method.doc: Determines whether the form requires respondents to log in to an account in the same domain or a subdomain before responding.

method.name: setAcceptingResponses
method.doc: Sets whether the form is currently accepting responses.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if the form should accept responses; false if not

method.name: setAllowResponseEdits
method.doc: Sets whether the form displays a link to edit a response after submitting it.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if the form should display an "Edit your response" link; false if not

method.name: setCollectEmail
method.doc: Sets whether the form collects respondents' email addresses.

argument.name: collect
argument.doc: true if the form should collect email addresses; false if not

method.name: setConfirmationMessage
method.doc: Sets the form's confirmation message.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the form's new confirmation message

method.name: setCustomClosedFormMessage
method.doc: Sets the message to display if the form is not accepting responses.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the message to display if the form is not accepting responses

method.name: setDescription
method.doc: Sets the form's description.

argument.name: description
argument.doc: the form's new description

method.name: setDestination
method.doc: Sets the destination where form responses are saved.

argument.name: type
argument.doc: the type of the form's response destination

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the ID of the form's response destination

method.name: setIsQuiz
method.doc: Sets whether the form is a quiz.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if quiz features should be enabled for the form; false if not

method.name: setLimitOneResponsePerUser
method.doc: Sets whether the form allows only one response per respondent.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if the form should allow only one response per respondent; false if not

method.name: setProgressBar
method.doc: Sets whether the form has a progress bar.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if the form should display a progress bar; false if not

method.name: setPublishingSummary
method.doc: Sets whether the form displays a link to view a summary of responses after a respondent submits the form.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if the form should display a "See previous responses" link; false if not

method.name: setRequireLogin
method.doc: Sets whether the form requires respondents to log in to an account in the same domain or a subdomain before responding.

argument.name: requireLogin
argument.doc: true if the form requires users to log in; false if not

method.name: setShowLinkToRespondAgain
method.doc: Sets whether the form displays a link to submit another response after a respondent completes the form.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: true if the form should display a "Submit another response" link; false if not

method.name: setShuffleQuestions
method.doc: Sets whether the order of the questions on each page of the form is randomized.

argument.name: shuffle
argument.doc: true if the order of the questions on each page of the form should be randomized; false if not

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the form's title.

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the form's new title

method.name: shortenFormUrl
method.doc: Converts a long URL for a form to a short URL.

method.name: submitGrades
method.doc: Submits grades for the given FormResponses.

forms.FormResponse.name: FormResponse
forms.FormResponse.doc: A response to the form as a whole. A FormResponse can be used in three ways: to access the answers submitted by a respondent (see getItemResponses()), to programmatically submit a response to the form (see withItemResponse(response) and submit()), and to generate a URL for the form which pre-fills fields using the provided answers. FormResponses can be created or accessed from a Form.

method.name: getEditResponseUrl
method.doc: Generates a URL that can be used to edit a response that has already been submitted, even if the Form.setAllowResponseEdits(enabled) setting is disabled.

method.name: getGradableItemResponses
method.doc: Gets all item responses contained in a form response, in the same order that the items appear in the form.

method.name: getGradableResponseForItem
method.doc: Gets the item response contained in a form response for a given item.

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the ID of the form response.

method.name: getItemResponses
method.doc: Gets all item responses contained in a form response, in the same order that the items appear in the form.

method.name: getRespondentEmail
method.doc: Gets the email address of the person who submitted a response, if the Form.setCollectEmail(collect) setting is enabled.

method.name: getResponseForItem
method.doc: Gets the item response contained in this form response for a given item.

method.name: getTimestamp
method.doc: Gets the timestamp for a form response submission.

method.name: submit
method.doc: Submits the response.

method.name: toPrefilledUrl
method.doc: Generates a URL for the form in which the answers are pre-filled based on the answers in this form response.

method.name: withItemGrade
method.doc: Adds the given item response's grades to a form response.

method.name: withItemResponse
method.doc: Adds the given item response to a form response.

forms.GridItem.name: GridItem
forms.GridItem.doc: A question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select one choice per row from a sequence of radio buttons. Items can be accessed or created from a Form.

method.name: clearValidation
method.doc: Removes any data validation for this grid item.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this grid item.

argument.name: responses
argument.doc: an array of valid answers for this grid item

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getColumns
method.doc: Gets the values for every column in the grid.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getRows
method.doc: Gets the values for every row in the grid.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setColumns
method.doc: Sets the columns of the grid based on an array of values.

argument.name: columns
argument.doc: an array of column values, which respondents see as labels when viewing the form

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setRows
method.doc: Sets the rows of the grid based on an array of values.

argument.name: rows
argument.doc: an array of row values, which respondents see as labels when viewing the form

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

method.name: setValidation
method.doc: Sets the data validation for this grid item.

argument.name: validation
argument.doc: a GridValidation to apply to this item.

method.name: requireLimitOneResponsePerColumn
method.doc: Requires limit of one response per column for a grid item.

forms.ImageItem.name: ImageItem
forms.ImageItem.doc: A layout item that displays an image. Items can be accessed or created from a Form.

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getAlignment
method.doc: Gets the image's horizontal alignment.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getImage
method.doc: Gets the image that is currently assigned to the item.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: getWidth
method.doc: Gets the image's width in pixels.

method.name: setAlignment
method.doc: Sets the image's horizontal alignment.

argument.name: alignment
argument.doc: the horizontal alignment

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setImage
method.doc: Sets the image itself.

argument.name: image
argument.doc: the image data

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

method.name: setWidth
method.doc: Sets the image's width in pixels.

argument.name: width
argument.doc: the width in pixels

forms.ItemResponse.name: ItemResponse
forms.ItemResponse.doc: A response to one question item within a form. Item responses can be accessed from FormResponse and created from any Item that asks the respondent to answer a question.

method.name: getFeedback
method.doc: Gets the feedback that was given for the respondent's submitted answer.

method.name: getItem
method.doc: Gets the question item that this response answers.

method.name: getResponse
method.doc: Gets the answer that the respondent submitted.

method.name: getScore
method.doc: Gets the score for the respondent's submitted answer.

method.name: setFeedback
method.doc: Sets the feedback that should be displayed for the respondent's submitted answer.

method.name: setScore
method.doc: Sets the score for the respondent's submitted answer.

forms.ListItem.name: ListItem
forms.ListItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a drop-down list. Items can be accessed or created from a Form.

method.name: createChoice
method.doc: Creates a new choice.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the choice's value, which respondents see as a label when viewing the form

method.name: createChoice
method.doc: Creates a new choice.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the choice's value, which respondents see as a label when viewing the form

argument.name: isCorrect
argument.doc: whether the choice is a correct answer

method.name: createChoice
method.doc: Creates a new choice with a page-navigation option that jumps to a given page-break item.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the choice's value, which respondents see as a label when viewing the form

argument.name: navigationItem
argument.doc: the item to navigate to

method.name: createChoice
method.doc: Creates a new choice with a page-navigation option.

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the choice's value, which respondents see as a label when viewing the form

argument.name: navigationType
argument.doc: the choice's navigation type

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this list item.

argument.name: response
argument.doc: a valid answer for this list item

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getChoices
method.doc: Gets all choices for an item.

method.name: getFeedbackForCorrect
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond correctly to a question.

method.name: getFeedbackForIncorrect
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond incorrectly to a question.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPoints
method.doc: Returns the point value of a gradeable item.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setChoiceValues
method.doc: Sets the choices for an item from an array of strings.

argument.name: values
argument.doc: the array of choice values, which respondents see as labels when viewing the form

method.name: setChoices
method.doc: Sets an array of choices for an item.

argument.name: choices
argument.doc: an array of choices

method.name: setFeedbackForCorrect
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond correctly to a question.

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback. A null value will clear the feedback.

method.name: setFeedbackForIncorrect
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond incorrectly to a question.

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setPoints
method.doc: Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.

argument.name: points
argument.doc: the number of a points a question item is worth

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

forms.MultipleChoiceItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a list of radio buttons or an optional "other" field. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are autograded.

method.doc: Sets the choices for an item from an array of strings.

forms.PageBreakItem.name: PageBreakItem
forms.PageBreakItem.doc: A layout item that marks the start of a page. Items can be accessed or created from a Form.

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getGoToPage
method.doc: Gets the PageBreakItem that the form will jump to after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPageNavigationType
method.doc: Gets the type of page navigation that occurs after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: setGoToPage
method.doc: Sets the page to jump to after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).

argument.name: goToPageItem
argument.doc: the page break to jump to after completing the page before this page break

method.name: setGoToPage
method.doc: Sets the type of page navigation that occurs after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).

argument.name: navigationType
argument.doc: the navigation action to take after completing the page before this page break

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

forms.ParagraphTextItem.name: ParagraphTextItem
forms.ParagraphTextItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to enter a block of text. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are graded.

method.name: clearValidation
method.doc: Removes any data validation for this paragraph text item.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this paragraph text item.

argument.name: response
argument.doc: an answer to the question posed by the item

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPoints
method.doc: Returns the point value of a gradeable item.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question that doesn't have a correct or incorrect answer (ie questions that require manual grading).

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setPoints
method.doc: Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.

argument.name: points
argument.doc: the number of a points a question item is worth

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

method.name: setValidation
method.doc: Sets the data validation for this paragraph text item.

argument.name: validation
argument.doc: a ParagraphTextValidation to apply to this item.

method.name: requireTextContainsPattern
method.doc: Requires response to contain pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must contain pattern

method.name: requireTextDoesNotContainPattern
method.doc: Requires response to not contain pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must not contain pattern

method.name: requireTextDoesNotMatchPattern
method.doc: Requires response to not match pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must not match pattern

method.name: requireTextLengthGreaterThanOrEqualTo
method.doc: Requires response length to be greater than or equal to value.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: paragraph text length must be greater than this value

method.name: requireTextLengthLessThanOrEqualTo
method.doc: Requires response length to be less than value.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: paragraph text length must be less than or equal to this value

method.name: requireTextMatchesPattern
method.doc: Requires response to match pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must match pattern

forms.QuizFeedback.name: QuizFeedback
forms.QuizFeedback.doc: The bean implementation of a Feedback, which contains properties common to all feedback, such as display text or links.

method.name: getLinkUrls
method.doc: Gets a list of the URLs associated with the Feedback.

method.name: getText
method.doc: Gets the Feedback's display text.

forms.QuizFeedbackBuilder.name: QuizFeedbackBuilder
forms.QuizFeedbackBuilder.doc: The base FeedbackBuilder that contains setters for properties common to all feedback, such as display text. Used to build Feedback objects.

method.name: addLink
method.doc: Adds a link to the feedback's supplemental material.

argument.name: url
argument.doc: the link to display under the display text

method.name: addLink
method.doc: Adds a link to the feedback's supplemental material.

argument.name: url
argument.doc: the link to display under the display text

argument.name: displayText
argument.doc: the text to display for the link

method.name: build
method.doc: Builds a Feedback of the corresponding type for this builder.

method.name: copy
method.doc: Returns a copy of this builder.

method.name: setText
method.doc: Sets the feedback text.

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new text

forms.ScaleItem.name: ScaleItem
forms.ScaleItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to choose one option from a numbered sequence of radio buttons. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are graded.

method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this scale item.

argument.doc: a TextValidation to apply to this item.

method.name: requireNumber
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number.

method.name: requireNumberBetween
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number between start and end, inclusive.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the lower bounds of the inclusive range

argument.name: end
argument.doc: the upper bounds of the inclusive range

method.name: requireNumberEqualTo
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number equal to value specified.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: the value which the item must be equal to.

method.name: requireNumberGreaterThan
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number greater than the value specified.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: the value which the item must be greater than.

method.name: requireNumberGreaterThanOrEqualTo
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number greater than or equal to the value specified.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: the value which the item must be greater than or equal to.

method.name: requireNumberLessThan
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number less than the value specified.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: the value which the item must be greater than.

method.name: requireNumberLessThanOrEqualTo
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number less than or equal to the value specified.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: the value which the item must be less than or equal to.

method.name: requireNumberNotBetween
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number not between start and end, inclusive.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the lower bounds of the inclusive range

argument.name: end
argument.doc: the upper bounds of the inclusive range

method.name: requireNumberNotEqualTo
method.doc: Requires text item to be a number not equal to the value specified.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: the value which the item must not be equal to.

method.name: requireTextContainsPattern
method.doc: Requires response to contain pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must contain pattern

method.name: requireTextDoesNotContainPattern
method.doc: Requires response to not contain pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must not contain pattern

method.name: requireTextDoesNotMatchPattern
method.doc: Requires response to not match pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must not match pattern

method.name: requireTextIsEmail
method.doc: Requires text item to be an email address.

method.name: requireTextIsUrl
method.doc: Requires text item to be a URL.

method.name: requireTextLengthGreaterThanOrEqualTo
method.doc: Requires response length to be greater than or equal to value.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: paragraph text length must be greater than this value

method.name: requireTextLengthLessThanOrEqualTo
method.doc: Requires response length to be less than value.

argument.name: number
argument.doc: paragraph text length must be less than or equal to this value

method.name: requireTextMatchesPattern
method.doc: Requires response to match pattern.

argument.name: pattern
argument.doc: text must match pattern

method.name: requireWholeNumber
method.doc: Requires text item to be a whole number.

forms.TimeItem.name: TimeItem
forms.TimeItem.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a time of day. Items can be accessed or created from a Form. When used in a quiz, these items are graded.

method.name: createResponse
method.doc: Creates a new ItemResponse for this time item.

argument.name: hour
argument.doc: the hour, represented as an integer from 0 to 23

argument.name: minute
argument.doc: the minute of the hour, represented as an integer from 0 to 59

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getPoints
method.doc: Returns the point value of a gradeable item.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: isRequired
method.doc: Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.

method.name: setGeneralFeedback
method.doc: Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question that doesn't have a correct or incorrect answer (ie questions that require manual grading).

argument.name: feedback
argument.doc: the new feedback

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setPoints
method.doc: Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.

argument.name: points
argument.doc: the number of a points a question item is worth

method.name: setRequired
method.doc: Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.

argument.name: enabled
argument.doc: whether the respondent must answer the question

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

forms.VideoItem.name: VideoItem
forms.VideoItem.doc: A layout item that displays a video. Items can be accessed or created from a Form.

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getAlignment
method.doc: Gets the video's horizontal alignment.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: getWidth
method.doc: Gets the video's width in pixels.

method.name: setAlignment
method.doc: Sets the video's horizontal alignment.

argument.name: alignment
argument.doc: the horizontal alignment

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

method.name: setVideoUrl
method.doc: Sets the video itself from a given YouTube URL or YouTube video ID.

argument.name: youtubeUrl
argument.doc: the YouTube URL or ID

method.name: setWidth
method.doc: Sets the video's width in pixels.

argument.name: width
argument.doc: the width in pixels

forms.Item.name: Item
forms.Item.doc: A generic form item that contains properties common to all items, such as title and help text. Items can be accessed or created from a Form.

method.name: asCheckboxGridItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a checkbox grid item.

method.name: asCheckboxItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a checkbox item.

method.name: asDateItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a date item.

method.name: asDateTimeItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a date-time item.

method.name: asDurationItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a duration item.

method.name: asGridItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a grid item.

method.name: asImageItem
method.doc: Returns the item as an image item.

method.name: asListItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a list item.

method.name: asMultipleChoiceItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a multiple-choice item.

method.name: asPageBreakItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a page-break item.

method.name: asParagraphTextItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a paragraph-text item.

method.name: asScaleItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a scale item.

method.name: asSectionHeaderItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a section-header item.

method.name: asTextItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a text item.

method.name: asTimeItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a time item.

method.name: asVideoItem
method.doc: Returns the item as a video item.

method.name: duplicate
method.doc: Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.

method.name: getHelpText
method.doc: Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the item's unique identifier.

method.name: getIndex
method.doc: Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.

method.name: getTitle
method.doc: Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the item's type, represented as an ItemType.

method.name: setHelpText
method.doc: Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like ImageItems, PageBreakItems, and SectionHeaderItems).

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the new help text

method.name: setTitle
method.doc: Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a SectionHeaderItem).

argument.name: title
argument.doc: the new title or header text

forms.Alignment.name: Alignment
forms.Alignment.doc: An enum representing the supported types of image alignment. Alignment types can be accessed from FormApp.Alignment.

property.name: LEFT
property.doc: Align the image to the left side of the form.

property.name: CENTER
property.doc: Align the image to the center of the form.

property.name: RIGHT
property.doc: Align the image to the right side of the form.

forms.DestinationType.name: DestinationType
forms.DestinationType.doc: An enum representing the supported types of form-response destinations. All forms, including those that do not have a destination set explicitly, save a copy of responses in the form's response store. Destination types can be accessed from FormApp.DestinationType.

property.name: SPREADSHEET
property.doc: A Google Sheets spreadsheet as a destination for form responses.

forms.FeedbackType.name: FeedbackType
forms.FeedbackType.doc: An enum representing the supported types of feedback. Feedback types can be accessed from FormApp.FeedbackType.

property.name: CORRECT
property.doc: Feedback that is automatically displayed to respondents for a question answered correctly. Correct feedback can only be attached to a question type that supports autograding (e.g. radio, checkbox, select)

property.name: INCORRECT
property.doc: Feedback that is automatically displayed to respondents for a question answered incorrectly. Incorrect feedback can only be attached to a question type that supports autograding (e.g. radio, checkbox, select)

property.name: GENERAL
property.doc: Feedback that is automatically displayed to respondents when they submit their response. General feedback can only be attached to question types that do not support auto-grading, but are gradeable (ie everything but grid)

forms.ItemType.name: ItemType
forms.ItemType.doc: An enum representing the supported types of form items. Item types can be accessed from FormApp.ItemType.

property.name: CHECKBOX
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to select one or more checkboxes, as well as an optional "other" field.

property.name: CHECKBOX_GRID
property.doc: A question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select multiple choices per row from a sequence of checkboxes.

property.name: DATE
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date.

property.name: DATETIME
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date and time.

property.name: DURATION
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a length of time.

property.name: GRID
property.doc: A question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select one choice per row from a sequence of radio buttons.

property.name: IMAGE
property.doc: A layout item that displays an image.

property.name: LIST
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a drop-down list.

property.name: MULTIPLE_CHOICE
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a list of radio buttons or an optional "other" field.

property.name: PAGE_BREAK
property.doc: A layout item that marks the start of a page.

property.name: PARAGRAPH_TEXT
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to enter a block of text.

property.name: SCALE
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to choose one option from a numbered sequence of radio buttons.

property.name: SECTION_HEADER
property.doc: A layout item that visually indicates the start of a section.

property.name: TEXT
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to enter a single line of text.

property.name: TIME
property.doc: A question item that allows the respondent to indicate a time of day.

forms.PageNavigationType.name: PageNavigationType
forms.PageNavigationType.doc: An enum representing the supported types of page navigation. Page navigation types can be accessed from FormApp.PageNavigationType.

property.name: CONTINUE
property.doc: Continue to the next page of the form after completing the current page.

property.name: GO_TO_PAGE
property.doc: Jump to a specified page of the form after completing the current page.

property.name: RESTART
property.doc: Restart the form from the beginning, without clearing answers entered so far, after completing the current page.

property.name: SUBMIT
property.doc: Submit the form response after completing the current page.
